TopicTitle: cannt load saved ships in my game ?.

Articles.Content:
i'm not sure what happened but i only got 2 ships and any new ship i make is saved but not listed as loadable in the game ?.

any ideas ?

1 minute ago, PGTART said:

i'm not sure what happened but i only got 2 ships and any new ship i make is saved but not listed as loadable in the game ?.

any ideas ?

Mods? .... Logs? ..... KSP version?

Please read the following so people can help you solve the issue you are having

its the latest version

all feature tech, community tech tree, mechjeb (not working), tweakscale(works), karbonite

Did you recently remove one mod you used to use? Could it be that all your previous saved ship used a part this mod used? If yes, since you removed that part from the game, the game can not load your previous ships.

As for Mechjeb, you can use the last dev build to make it work in KSP.

If it wasn't due to a missing mod, then you'll have to upload your logs.

well i am having for a while now, i think it started when the game ran out of disk space, it never came back.
might it be some kind of index file is broken for those ship save files ?.

solved one ship file was corrupt ( zero bytes ), deleted it now it works again.
it should better check if it can write before writing to disk and check if a file has been written or not.
